trans-unit.source: Specifies the placement of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref> with respect to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar"></xref>相對於<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The TickBarPlacement enumeration is used to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.
trans-unit.target: 用來設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> TickBarPlacement 列舉

trans-unit.source: The actual position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> is defined by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property identifies this position so that the ticks of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> are drawn correctly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>屬性會識別這個位置，讓兩次刻度<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>正確繪製。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows how <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar> controls are drawn when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> property is set to Top and Bottom.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示如何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>控制項就會繪製時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A>屬性設定為上方和下方。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.TickBar>

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 刻度軸置於下方<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 刻度列位於左邊<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 刻度列位於右邊<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The tick bar is positioned above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 刻度軸置於上方<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track"></xref>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Slider"> </xref>。
